entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to a few flurries and ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
